name: youtube-analyzer
description: Analyze YouTube videos, channels, and playlists. Get video details, search content, list comments, retrieve transcripts, browse playlists, and calculate engagement metrics. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: youtube_analyzer
toolDefinition.description: Analyze YouTube content: get video details, search videos, get channel info, list comments, retrieve transcripts, browse playlists, and calculate engagement metrics. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for YouTube API access.

action.description: get_video (video details), search (search videos/channels/playlists), get_channel (channel info), list_comments (video comments), get_transcript (video transcript/captions), get_playlist (playlist items), analyze_engagement (engagement metrics)

videoId.description: YouTube video ID. Required for get_video, list_comments, get_transcript, analyze_engagement.

channelId.description: YouTube channel ID. Required for get_channel.

playlistId.description: YouTube playlist ID. Required for get_playlist.

query.description: Search query string. Required for search.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default varies by action).

order.description: Sort order for search (relevance|date|viewCount|rating) or comments (relevance|time).

type.description: Content type filter for search (default: video).
